price: ߣߌ߫ ߞߎߡߊ ߘߏ߫ ߞߐ߲߰ߣߍ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߓߟߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߕߊ߫ ߟߐ߯ߟߊߣߍ߲ ߸ ߊ߬ ߕߎ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߝߍ߲ߝߍߘߍ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߍ߯
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakāna lizāman wa-ajalun musamman
